facts:

3, On completion of investigation, 1.0. has submitted Charge-Sheet against the above named accused person U/S 4 of POCSO Act, 2012.

During trial, prosecution side has examined only three witnesses including the informant and the victim.
issue:
POINTS FOR DETERMINATION ARE - 7.
(1) Whether on 27.08.2017, at about 6.00 P.M. accused committed penetrative sexual assault on the victim 'P'?
ANALYSIS:
P.W.3 deposed nothing regarding the incident between the accused and the victim 'P.
Thus it is clear that there was no material whatsoever regarding penetrative sexual assault (rape) by the accused.
13. Considering all above, | am of the opinion that prosecution has failed to prove the ingredients of charge U/S 4 of POCSO Act, 2012 against the accused As such, accused Sri Munu Bhumij is acquitted from the charges U/S 4 of POCSO Act, 2012 and set at liberty forthwith.

14.
decision:
